name: Windows Meterpreter (Reflective Injection), Reverse TCP Stager with UUID Support

description:
Inject the Meterpreter server DLL via the Reflective Dll Injection payload (staged). Requires Windows XP SP2 or newer.

Connect back to the attacker with UUID Support
